trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Lewisville
There were no other sightings in Lewisville on or around February 19th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsOn car trip from College Station Texas to Dallas Texas for high school basketball game with team members. Viewed stationary craft near power tower fairly close to ground. Watched for several seconds until view blocked due to driving under bridge overpass. Upon emerging from overpass, noted object had vanished from sky. No clouds...100% clear weather that day.
Summary: Low in the sky (level with car window - hundred feet above ground)... near power tower...silver.. no wings or tail. Vanished after 10 seconds.
